verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Maskil of David, when the) (Ziphites came and said to Saul, "Is not David hiding himself among us?") Save<WH3467> me, O God,<WH430> by Thy name,<WH8034> And vindicate<WH1777> me by Thy power.<WH1369>
Hear<WH8085> my prayer,<WH8605> O God;<WH430> Give<WH238> ear<WH238> to the words<WH561> of my mouth.<WH6310>

For strangers<WH2114> have risen<WH6965> against<WH5921> me, And violent<WH6184> men<WH6184> have sought<WH1245> my life;<WH5315> They have not set<WH7760> God<WH430> before<WH5048> them. Selah.<WH5542>
Behold,<WH2009> God<WH430> is my helper;<WH5826> The Lord<WH136> is the sustainer<WH5564> of my soul.<WH5315>
He will recompense<WH7725> the evil<WH9563> to my foes;<WH9596> Destroy<WH6789> them in Thy faithfulness.<WH571>
Willingly<WH5071> I will sacrifice<WH2076> to Thee; I will give<WH3034> thanks<WH3034> to Thy name,<WH8034> O Lord,<WH3068> for it is good.<WH2896>
For He has delivered<WH5337> me from all<WH3605> trouble;<WH6869> And my eye<WH5869> has looked<WH7200> [with satisfaction] upon my enemies.<WH340>
